name: Lots of Meat
desc: Over 100g of meat a day (e.g. 1 steak of serving of mince)

name: Medium of Meat
desc: Meat every other day on average

name: Low Meat
desc: Some meat consumed but no beef

name: Pescatarian
desc: A serving of fish or seafood, every other day on average

name: Vegetarian
desc: No meat, but eggs or dairy products consumed

name: Vegan
desc: No meat, dairy, eggs, or other animal products consumed
